Try to survive long enough and compare your e-score with friends. It's not about the destination it's about the journey they said !

I've start this project a week ago to Learn Unity and C# and currently there is a LOT of feature i need to add.

Here is the huge list of things i wanna add to the game:

  1. Multiple Maps for Arcade Mode ( With gameplay variation )
  2.  Arenji mode ( Full RNG ) 
  3. Speedrun Mode ( for Arcade )
  4. Scoreboard 
  5. Achievement system 
  6. A way to Change Skin ( and/or Unlock some ) 
  7. Controller Support
  8. Resolution dropdown in settings

And obviously some bugs to fix.

Thanks for reading till here !
